title: Ship loaded with 1,200 tons of food to try to alleviate Gaza hunger crisis approaches Israeli port – Middle East crisis live
summary: Ship departed Cyprus’s main port of Limassol containing aid which will be distribute by UN and World Central Kitchen, says Cypriot foreign ministry Hello and welcome to our live coverage of Israel’s war on Gaza. A ship loaded with 1,200 tons of food supplies for Gaza is approaching the Israeli port of Ashdod. Continue reading...

title: US says UK has withdrawn demand to access Apple users' encrypted data
summary: UK authorities have demanded access to Apple users' protected files when required for investigations.
